value.name: Murder of William Butler - Wikipedia
value.snippet: The murder of William Butler was an early example of a school shooting in Louisville, Kentucky in 1853. [1] [2] Background [ edit] William Butler was a 28 year old teacher, a Yankee from Indiana who came to Louisville and founded the Louisville School, attracting pupils from the wealthy families. [1] As a teacher he was strict about discipline.

value.name: British Executions - Thomas Clements (William Butler) - 1910
value.snippet: William Butler Age: 62 Sex: male Crime: murder Date Of Execution: 24 Mar 1910 Crime Location: Tank Cottage, Bassaleg, Newport Execution Place: Usk Method: hanging Executioner: Henry Pierrepoint Source: http://discovery.nationalarchives.co.uk William Butler was convicted of the murder of Charles Thomas 82 and Mary Thomas 72 and sentenced to death.

value.name: British Executions - William Allen Butler - 1916
value.snippet: William Butler murdered Florence Beatrice Butler 29 who he stabbed to death at 2 Bath Terrace, Chequers Walk, Birmingham on 20 May 1916. They had been dating but William Butler had started to beat Florence Butler and William Butler who was lodging in the house was asked to leave.

value.name: William Butler (actor) - Wikipedia
value.snippet: William Butler (born 1968) is an American actor, writer, director, make-up artist, special effects technician and producer. History [ edit ] Butler is known for playing characters who are killed off in many of the horror films that he has appeared in.

value.name: William Thomas Butler | Murderpedia, the encyclopedia of murderers
value.snippet: William Thomas Butler When the body of Ernest Percival Key was discovered in his shop just before midday on Saturday 24th December 1938 it was covered in blood. The 64-year-old victim had been stabbed more than thirty times in his head and face and there were more wounds to his arms.

value.name: Mord på William Butler - Murder of William Butler - abcdef.wiki
value.snippet: Butler anklagade Ward för att ha ätit kastanjer i klassen, vilket den senare förnekade. Butler anklagade honom för att vara en lögnare och administrerade en piskning, vilket inte var ovanligt på 1800 -talet. Ward tog sin hatt och lämnade skolan efter straff.

value.name: William Butler'ın öldürülmesi - Murder of William Butler
value.snippet: Butler, 3 Kasım 1853 sabahı erken saatlerde öldü. Şerif hem Matthews'u hem de Roberts Jnr'ı tutukladı. Butler popüler bir öğretmendi ve zengin bir adamın oğlunun elinde ölümü Louisville'deki birçok kişiyi çileden çıkardı.

value.name: William Butler meggyilkolása - Murder of William Butler
value.snippet: Háttér. William Butler 28 éves tanár volt, egy indianai jenki, aki Louisville -be jött, és megalapította a Louisville -i iskolát, amely a gazdag családok tanulóit vonzotta.Tanárként szigorú volt a fegyelem tekintetében. 28 éves volt, házas és apa. Húsz hónapig volt a Ward család oktatója, mielőtt Európába utazott, hogy fejlessze nyelvtudását a tanításhoz.
